option.value:
package %packageName%
class %screenName%%screenElement%

option.value: Layout XML

option.name: template
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <layout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/white">
<RelativeLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_centerInParent="true" tools:text="Insert content here" />
</RelativeLayout>
<include android:id="@+id/not_network" layout="@layout/layout_error_not_network_connection" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:visibility="gone" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />
<include android:id="@+id/generic_error" layout="@layout/layout_error_generic" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" android:visibility="gone" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout> </layout>

option.name: fileType
option.value: Layout XML

option.name: template
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <layout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto">
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" tools:context="%packageName%.view.%screenName%ViewActivity">
<androidx.fragment.app.FragmentContainerView android:id="@+id/content_fragment_%screenName%" android:name="androidx.navigation.fragment.NavHostFragment" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" app:defaultNavHost="true" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintLeft_toLeftOf="parent" app:layout_constraintRight_toRightOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:navGraph="@navigation/%screenNameLowerCase%_view_navigation" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout> </layout>

option.name: fileType
option.value: Layout XML

option.name: template
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <navigation xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:id="@+id/%screenNameSnakeCase%_navigation" app:startDestination="@id/%screenNameSnakeCase%_entry">
<fragment android:id="@+id/%screenNameSnakeCase%_entry" android:name="%packageName%.view.%screenName%ViewFragment" android:label="%screenName%Entry" tools:layout="@layout/%screenNameSnakeCase%_view_fragment"> </fragment>
</navigation>

option.name: template
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <layout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/%screenNameSnakeCase%_parent" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" android:elevation="0dp" app:cardElevation="0dp">
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout android:background="@color/gray" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="@dimen/_100sdp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:ellipsize="end" android:maxLines="2" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" tools:text="Insert your view here" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView> </layout>
